0: AN ACT SEPARATING THE WIGAN INTEGRATED SCHOOL -  SECONDARY IN BARANGAY WIGAN IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF CORDON, PROVINCE OF ISABELA FROM THE ELEMENTARY SCHOOL; CONVERTING IT INTO AN INDEPENDENT NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL TO BE KNOWN AS WIGAN NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
